price: Jedhi: “Ani Rabbuma qofaan, amantii kiyya Isaaf qulqulleessaa ta’ee gabbara.”
arabic: قُلِ ٱللَّهَ أَعۡبُدُ مُخۡلِصٗا لَّهُۥ دِينِي

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: quli al-laha aʿbudu mukh'liṣan lahu dīnī
